item.title: France re-opened schools, now there's a second wave of Covid cases
item.description:
Just one week after a third of French schoolchildren went back to school in an easing of the coronavirus lockdown, there's been a worrying flare up of about 70 Covid-19 cases linked to schools.
Some ...

item.description:

Petrol stations, clothing and book stores and restaurants are among the financial losers ...
